Package node.sharedMemory

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DetectionFrequency
    Just holds an atomic integer for the frequency
    DetectionFrequencyIp  
    DetectionFrequencyString  
    InterfaceAddressStats
    Contains a list of detection event frequencies for an address of an interface.
    InterfaceStatistics  
    MPSM
    Holds all malicious IP patterns and malicious String patterns.
    Node_SharedMemory
    Guarantees that all updates will be synchronized.
    SMPSM
    Contains statistics for all interfaces and all patterns.
    StringPattern  
    StringPatternDetectionEvents
    A simple pair for storing detections of malicious patterns
